tutorials.title: Lab 100: Containerize Your Java Microservice
tutorials.description: Use Wercker to automatically build your application and package it as a Docker image

tutorials.title: Lab 200: Automate Deployment to Kubernetes
tutorials.description: Use Wercker to set up a managed Kubernetes cluster and deploy to it

tutorials.title: Lab 300: Make a Bug Fix to Your Java Microservice
tutorials.description: Go from code change to production using Wercker

tutorials.title: Lab 400: Kubernetes Blue/Green Deployments
tutorials.description: Stage your new version without disrupting the current deployment

tutorials.title: Lab 500: (Optional) Extend Your Application with a Function
tutorials.description: Install Fn in Kubernetes and Deploy a Function
